desc: すべての毒を内包するとエルガイアに伝えられる妖鳥リンの羽

dictionary.lore: There are many Elgaian tales of a harpy that lives a very short life due to it being wholly made from poison. Lynn was thought to be imaginary, but has recently been confirmed to exist in Grand Gaia. Lynn Feathers have been found in Morgan and St. Lamia, and, just as told in folk tales, are composed of countless poisons.

name: リンの羽

usage.name: 雷弓ライジング・サン
